page.title: 17P.C Culverhouse
page.content: When an accident occurs you have to check the cars to see if there is any clue of what happened in the accident.If someone has been burgled the policeman gets there first and asks the people who have been burgled what has been taken.If there is a bad crash the policman gets there first. First he sees whether anybody is hurt,then if they are hurt he has to do first aid on them and take them to hospital.Then they have to safeguard the site and look in the cars for people's names and addresses.
